k so last monday my friend Sara asked me to go to her senior formal. i always told myself that i would not get invold in highschool things cuz well im not in highschool anymore, but iv known Sara for awhile and i thought why not plus my friend josh was going too. anywho it was fun. we all got dressed up and went out to eat and then just chilled for the rest of the night. oh and we drove around downtown. so ya here are some pics ya i look cool i guess Sara and Me My friend Luke said that i look like im in deep thought but then i told him that i was eating a chilli cheese bur-E-toe but im sure i was in deep thought while eating it ummm ya there r more but its pretty much the same thing over and over. the girls have the better pics so ill try to get those from them cuz they have of the buddy pics and stuff.

iv been looking at some old pics of me and my friends skating and i really miss doing it every now and then i put my skates on and just roll around for fun and some times i watch this video of me skating (which was the last time i skated) were i jumped off a roof and did some runs wit my friends over at Southern Polly Tech anywho i scanned some pics in for u guys to see some of u have seen them before so nothing new This one is one of favs. i like the background. i even remeber what day it was. Jan. 1, 2000 this one was late at night after my friend Hugh (who was a skateboarder) was scared to board slide that rail so i put my shoes on grabed his skateboard and did it after some trys just to show that i could do it sad thing is now there r nubs on those rails :( Me jumping a gap from some parking lot into Roswell rd. dont worry we had ppl in the streets looking out for cars me falling and yes it probly hurt now thats how its done this trick was the shit back in the day. it had 3 names. Sidewalk or Darkside/Darkslide and that rail was really long longest one me and my friends have done and a side view of that rail so ya thats it some day ill pick the boots back up and "thrash the streets again" (thats for u Sarah) keep it real kids -Berto

You scored as Satanism. Your beliefs most closely resemble those of Satanism! Before you scream, do a bit of research on it. To be a Satanist, you don't actually have to believe in Satan. Satanism generally focuses upon the spiritual advancement of the self, rather than upon submission to a deity or a set of moral codes. Do some research if you immediately think of the satanic cult stereotype. Your beliefs may also resemble those of earth-based religions such as paganism.

they put on an awesome show!!!!
and they r all about the fans which is awesome

all the bands that played were realy good 
the line up: AutoPilot Off, Letter Kills, My Chemical Romance, Story of the Year.

Letter Kills was really good the sing  Matt Shelton  was throwing the mic around like crazy swinging it and catching it and he even busted his ass.

Now Story of the Year was just amazing 
Dan Marsala jumped out into the crowd and i was like right there 
i grabbed his arm
he was so close to me

any who i had a great time and all the bands were awesome
there r so many other stories to tell about what went on at the show but i dont feel like typing all of it
so peace out kids and stay true

ok so i will no longer go by my real name of Alberto or Berto

ill will give u guys a list a names that ill respond to 

1. Omega Turbo- yes its the name of my 2nd guitar and it will also be my new name.  "Le-go my Ome-go" great line that me and Jordan made up while at media play looking at the DVDs

2. Turbo- short for Omega Turbo

3. Omega Gun- cuz i just made it up

4. Revolver Ocelot- ya sounds cool nuff said

5. Danger- i was never given a middle name so i made one up til i find out how to get a name change so i can have a middle name, but lets say i do. so when im walking down the street and and see me ur not going to say "sup Berto".  no ur going to say "whats going down Danger? fight any evil doers today?"  cuz i do that kind of stuff.

6. Cookie- one day i was at Dairy Queen and i wanted to order a small cookie dough breez. well for some strange reason when i got to the word cookie my voice cracked so much that no other word would come out after i tryed to say cookie. ya funny i know, but i doesnt stop there.  it happened 4 times in a row! finial it came out and i got my small cooKIEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!  ya thats how it was.  so i told some friends from work my story  and one of them said ur nick name should be cookie so im cool with that.

7. Option Zero- its my DJ name well more like my music production name cuz i havent touch the turntables in a long time.

8. Dr. Ill Skill-  my old DJ name. yes i will respond to it cuz it makes me sound like a doctor. 



well thats it for now and hope u guys will remember these names so when u see u will know what to call me.
